plot outline: Sameer and Sonali adopt a boy and name him Sachin who grows up to be very talented and is appreciated for it.He studies at a school where everyone loves and is close to his school peon Ganpat Mama who cares fro everyone.But things don't remain the same when he is diagnosed with Aids.Sachin then has to face obstacles from society as well as the parents of children in his school request the principal to not allow him in school.
title: Aamhi Chamakate Taare
plot: a talented school boy who struggles to face the obstacles life has has.

Sameer and Sonali adopt a boy and name him Sachin who grows up to be very talented and is appreciated for it.He studies at a school where everyone loves and is close to his school peon Ganpat Mama who cares fro everyone.But things don't remain the same when he is diagnosed with Aids.Sachin then has to face obstacles from society as well as the parents of children in his school request the principal to not allow him in school.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
